DOC.detailed_description: This Prospective pilot study perform Fetal Care Unit Ain Shams University Maternity Hospital . Ninety pregnant woman recruit Fetal Care Unit fulfill inclusion criterion . They counsel include study . All case subject : 1 . Full history take include patient 's age , parity , last menstrual period , estimate gestational age date , past history medical disorder , clinical examination ( General abdominal ) . 2 . Two-Dimensional Ultrasound Five-Dimensional Ultrasound do case assessment fetal Heart . - 90 consecutive patient undergo 2D fetal echocardiography one observer - Then undergo blindly Five-Dimensional fetal echocardiography another observer - The data collect compare evaluate accuracy Five-Dimensional US fetal heart assessment .
